channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for gematsu_com

item.title: ‘Boomer slasher’ Bloodthief launches September 22
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Parkour your way through hazardous dungeons.

Bloodthief, a “boomer slasher” game that combines speedy high-skill melee combat with modern movement mechanics, will launch for PC via Steam on September 22, developer Blargis announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Blargis:

About

In Bloodthief, you play as a vampire whose thirst for blood fuels both speed and power. By drinking the blood of undead foes, you’ll unleash devastating abilities, parkour through hazardous dungeons, and carve your way through haunted castles at blistering pace.

The player shooting open a hole in a mansion’s wall to burst through it, parkour off the outside wall, and shoot a hole into another masion wall to run back inside

Key Features

  • Boomer Slasher Gameplay – A high-octane fusion of retro-inspired challenge and modern melee movement design.
  • Momentum-Fueled Combat – Every attack feeds your momentum, letting you wall-run, vault, and dash through enemies without breaking flow.
  • Vampiric Power System – Blood isn’t just health, it’s your fuel for speed, abilities, and survival.
  • Branching Dungeons – Discover shortcuts, hidden loot, and powerful abilities across twisting, labyrinthine levels.
  • Challenge and mastery – Built for players who love to speedrun, you will collect medals, race ghosts, and compete for the top time on the leaderboard.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/boomer-slasher-bloodthief-launches-september-22

item.title: Angry Video Game Nerd 8-bit launches October 23
item.content:encoded:
• NES
  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Physical editions available via Limited Run Games.

Angry Video Game Nerd 8-bit, a new side-scrolling action platformer set in the Angry Video Game Nerd universe, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on October 23, publisher Retroware and developer Mega Cat Studios announced. Physical editions for modern platforms and Nintendo Entertainment System via will be available via Limited Run Games. A demo is currently available for PC.

Here is an overview of the game, via Retroware:

About

The ultimate nerd rage is back in Angry Video Game Nerd 8-bit—an all-new action platformer set in the Angry Video Game Nerd universe! As The Nerd, blast your way across a host of pixel art levels crawling with zombies, mechanical skeletons, ghoulish reapers, and more!

Key Features

  • The 8-Bit Experience – Run, jump, slide, and shoot your way through levels in this new 8-bit installment featuring the Angry Video Game Nerd! It doesn’t just look like an 8-bit game—there will also be a cartridge version available for actual retro hardware!
  • The Angry Video Game Nerd Universe in 8-Bit Form – Journey through multiple levels inspired by the Angry Video Game Nerd universe, and blast away at enemies themed around each level! Slide below platforms, pick up power-ups, and take alternate routes to get to the boss room!
  • Familiar Faces, New Fights – As The Nerd heads into the pixel-ridden fight, he must face off against familiar faces from his past! Waiting at the end of every level, bosses from the Angry Video Game Nerd universe hope to destroy The Nerd!


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/angry-video-game-nerd-8-bit-launches-october-23

item.title: Blade & Soul Heroes launches September 24 in the west
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

Free-to-play collectible action MMORPG dated.

Free-to-play collectible action MMORPG Blade & Soul Heroes will launch for PC via Steam and Purple, iOS, and Android on September 24 in the west, NCSOFT announced.

Blade & Soul Heroes first launched on August 28, 2024 as Hoyeon in Korea and Go-En in Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

This thrilling free-to-play collectible action MMORPG offers the duality of turn-based strategy and real-time action. Experience exciting cross-platform play and embark on an epic quest where numerous stories are waiting to be discovered alongside your five member team. Unite your heroes!

Story

Journey with Yusol as she strives to rebuild her clan and enact justice against those who destroyed it. Follow her as she pursues the evil Yi Chun and unravels the mysteries of the Heaven’s Fall Cult. Along the way, she’ll encounter an expansive cast of heroes, each with their own skills and story, who will join her resurgent clan and unite in the fight to defeat Yi Chun and Heaven’s Fall.

Key Features

  • Dual Combat System
    • Seamlessly switch between turn-based strategy and real-time action.
    • In turn-based mode, all five team members take the battle field to unite for victory.
    • For real-time action, one designated lead hero fights the various enemies supported by four skill-linked allies
  • Character Collection – Build and grow your five-hero team to begin your journey. With over 40 heroes to unlock, each with their unique skills and stories, a variety of legendary characters awaits you to join your clan.
  • Visual Style – Immerse yourself in this anime-inspired world with majestic vistas, eerie forests, ancient deserts, and mythical dungeons of the Earthen Realm. Each hero models a distinctive look and feel evocative of the elements.
  • Deep Tactical Combat – To defeat your foes, master your fighting abilities with a wide array of combinations and skills. With each battle, tailor your team strategically in order to achieve victory across different opponents and environments.

Watch a new trailer below.

Heroes in Action: Animated Cinematic Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/blade-soul-heroes-launches-september-24-in-the-west

item.title: New BrokenLore game to be unveiled at TGS 2025
item.content:encoded:
First screenshots and teaser video.

Serafini Productions will unveil a new BrokenLore game at Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan, the studio announced.

News regarding the new title will be presented alongside the latest information about the upcoming BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW.

It should be noted that this mysterious title is separate from the newly announced BrokenLore: DARK DAWN.

Here are the first screenshots:



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/new-brokenlore-game-to-be-unveiled-at-tgs-2025

item.title: BrokenLore: DARK DAWN announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Confront the darkest of crimes.

Serafini Productions has announced BrokenLore: DARK DAWN, a new entry in the BrokenLore saga for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

BrokenLore: DARK DAWN is described as “a first-person psychological horror where abduction, human trafficking, and the darkest corners of the dark web converge with psychological terror and hallucinations.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Serafini Productions:

About

About

Face the horrors of abduction and the terror within your own mind.

From the BrokenLore saga comes DARK DAWN, a first-person survival horror where reality fractures into paranoia, despair, and nightmarish visions.

You play as a kidnapping victim forced to confront crimes like human trafficking, organ harvesting, and the hidden horrors of the dark web. But surviving your captors is only the beginning. Your own fragile mind may prove to be the deadliest enemy of all.

Key Features

  • Time is Against You – Your biological clock dictates when events unfold. Rest too long and death may come in your sleep. Act too soon and you risk being unprepared. Every decision carries weight.
  • Survive by Creating – Scavenge and craft tools to improve your chances of survival. Every resource matters, and every mistake could be fatal.
  • The Mind is a Prison – Potent sedatives drag you into hallucinations that twist the familiar into the grotesque. One moment you are in a toy store filled with stuffed animals, the next in a savannah stalked by predators. Escaping your own mind will be one of your greatest challenges.
  • Despair Consumes You – Neglect your mental health and panic will take control. Dark entities will hunt you relentlessly, feeding on your despair until nothing remains.
  • A BrokenLore Experience – DARK DAWN pushes horror into forbidden territory. There are no safe places, no stable ground, only choices, lies, and the creeping dread that every path may lead to your doom.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/brokenlore-dark-dawn-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

item.title: Narrative adventure game RatScum announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

A game about being lost, identity, and belonging.

Eclair Games has announced side-scrolling narrative adventure game RatScum for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Eclair Games:

About

Fallen into the sewer, a lone rat embarks on the long journey of returning home in an estranged, crumbling apartment. Navigate forgotten corners and unfamiliar spaces, befriend unlikely allies, and slip through dangers and shadows in the cracks of a broken world.

Beneath a derelict apartment on the edge of the city, a rat wakes up in isolation and unfamiliarity. Stumbling upon floors and pipes to survive while searching for a way back home, it finds everyone here in desperate need of escaping from something.

RatScum is a narrative adventure about lost, identity, and belonging. You play as a rat trying to return home: climb through vents and strange spaces, solve puzzles and avoid dangers, spy on tenants, befriend stranger rats, and uncover the stories whispered behind the walls.

Set out into this crumbling yet whimsical world, where even in the filth and the forgotten, there is beauty. And something like peace.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Rodent Power – As a rat, you have to use your tiny rat brain to think outside the box. Slink through the shadows, outsmart the traps, and use your power to navigate through this murky place.
  • Make Allies – Every rat knows that surviving without the help of your own kind is never easy, especially when everyone sees you as an outsider. To find your way home, it might be wiser to be accepted by them.
  • Tense Encounters – Most tenants don’t enjoy surprise visits from furry strangers. If they spot you, they’ll panic. Or worse. Stay quiet, stay hidden, and prepare for a hasty retreat when things get loud.
  • A Strange Little Story – Curiosity leads the way, and nothing is quite as it seems. When the lights go out, be cautious of the strange things hidden beneath the charm, still waiting to be uncovered.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Teaser Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/narrative-adventure-game-ratscum-announced-for-pc

item.title: Flick Shot Rogues launches September 17
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Roguelike action game dated.

Roguelike action game Flick Shot Rogues will launch for PC via Steam on September 17, publisher Noodlecake and developer Butter By The Fish announced. A demo is available now.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Plan, aim, shoot! Flick Shot Rogues blends the tactile satisfaction of flicking stuff across a table with the strategic depth of your favorite turn-based roguelikes. Chain together ridiculous combos, unlock characters, items and skills, and conquer the island!

Key Features

  • Onward! – Plan, aim, shoot! Flick Shot Rogues is a super-satisfying roguelike dungeon crawler about lining up the perfect shot to send your hero spinning across the board.
  • Everything is a Trickshot – Trigger wickedly explosive combos and blast the battlefield apart, but don’t be hasty—a misfire could spell your doom!
  • Unique Every Try – Death is not the end! Each new journey across the island will reshuffle the enemies and offer different rewards. Rise to the challenge and adapt your strategy accordingly!
  • Crazy Upgrades to Discover – Collect powerful items, talents, and curses, each with unique and game-changing effects. Brave the risks of the curse and supercharge your run with game breaking interactions.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/flick-shot-rogues-launches-september-17

item.title: Friends vs Friends coming to PS5, Xbox Series on September 1
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Multiplayer first-person shooter / deckbuilder currently available for PC.

Multiplayer first-person shooter / deckbuilder Friends vs Friends will launch for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on September 1, publisher Raw Fury and developer Brainwash Gang announced. It will support cross-play.

Friends vs Friends first launched for PC via Steam on May 30, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Raw Fury:

About

Choose your stylish character, create a custom deck of madcap weapons and abilities, and hop into fast-paced multiplayer mayhem with friends and friends you’ve yet to meet!

Friends vs Friends combines combat and deck-building with all the frenetic fun of an online player-versus-player shooter. Your powers, weapons and debuffs are all played from your card deck—become a titan, summon friendly turrets, steal health with vampire bullets, or just give your opponent a big freaking head! Earn new cards, level them up, and unlock new characters with unique skills in chaotic one-versus-one or two-versus-two game modes.

Key Features

  • Friends vs Friends – Matchmake with players worldwide in one-versus-one or two-versus-two combat, or host private matches with your friends. Need support? Invite your friends to spectate!
  • A Game with Character – Choose from a stylish cast of characters, each with their own abilities that improve the synergies of your deck.
  • Low Price + High Quality = How?! – In order to keep the crew together, we made sure to level the playing field on cost so jumping in is a big-brain move.
  • Progress to Impress – Level up and get new cards through matched bouts and timed challenges.
  • Stack Your Deck – Collect weapon, trap, and curse cards, then level them up to increase their power.
  • Updates and Seasonal Content – Expect post-launch content, including new unique characters, cards, maps, and upgrades to your home base.
  • Play Dress-Up – Unlock cool cosmetics like skins and card design variants for bragging rights!
  • Practice, Practice, Practice – Go up against bots to try out new card combos and improve your skills for when it counts.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/friends-vs-friends-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-on-september-1
